Interface ExosuitArmor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Engineerable, net.minecraftforge.common.ISpecialArmor

    public interface ExosuitArmor
extends net.minecraftforge.common.ISpecialArmor, Engineerable

    • Method Detail

      • getItemIconResource

        net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation getItemIconResource()
        Returns:
        The string representing the location for the armor's item texture.

      • hasUpgrade

        boolean hasUpgrade(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me,
                   net.minecraft.item.Item check)
        Parameters:
        me - The armor piece to check in.
        check - The item upgrade to check for.
        Returns:
        Whether the provided piece of armor has the provided exosuit upgrade. Should return false if either are null.

      • getUpgrades

        @Nonnull
ExosuitUpgrade[] getUpgrades(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack self)
        Parameters:
        self - The ItemStack containing the armor piece
        Returns:
        An array of all of the ExosuitUpgrades in this armor piece. Cannot be null.

      • getInstalledEventHandlers

        @Nonnull
ExosuitEventHandler[] getInstalledEventHandlers(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack self)
        Parameters:
        self - The ItemStack containing the armor piece.
        Returns:
        An array of all the ExosuitEventHandlers installed in the armor piece. This includes both ExosuitUpgrades and ExosuitPlates, along with anything else that you may create that implements ExosuitEventHandler. This is used for event handling delegation, but is not limited to that. Cannot be null.
